thread.title: Make actual robots with Lego Boost - CNET
thread.title_full: Make actual robots with Lego Boost - CNET

author: Patrick Holland
title: Make actual robots with Lego Boost - CNET
text:
Make actual robots with Lego Boost Lego Boost 
Lego announced its Boost, a set of programmable motors to bring your Lego creations to life. Photo by: Patrick Holland/CNET 
Since the motors are programmable you can use the Lego app to create motion-sensitive toys or even record voice effects. Photo by: Josh Miller/CNET 
The app runs on both iOS and Android. Photo by: Josh Miller/CNET 
Meet Frankie the Cat. He's one of five robots that you can design and build right out of the box. Photo by: Patrick Holland/CNET 
But, you can also customize your own Lego robot with any existing Legos you have. Photo by: Patrick Holland/CNET 
This is the Multi-tool Rover. it's one of the Photo by: Patrick Holland/CNET
